title: Sausage hotpot with lentils
ingredients: ['1 tsp vegetable oil', '8 good-quality sausages, about 450g in total', '2 red onions, sliced', '2 red peppers, seeded and thickly sliced', '300ml beef or vegetable stock', '420g can green lentils, drained and rinsed', '1/2 tsp dried mixed herbs', 'salt and freshly ground black pepper']
